FileSystemHandleIsSameEntry.summary:
The isSameEntry() method of the
interface compares two {{domxref("FileSystemHandle",
"handles")}} to see if the associated entries (either a file or directory) match.

remarks.para:
-File System API
-The File System Access API: simplifying access to local files

FileSystemHandleIsSameEntry.returns: A Promise that fulfills with a .
